David and Bersheba. To a pleasant new tune.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts).
s.n., [S.l. : between 1674-1700]
Verse: "When David in Jerusalem ..." In this edition there are three woodcuts below the title, and the text is in two columns. Date of publication suggested by dates of other editions. Imperfect: cropped, affecting imprint. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
